function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Job reductions in the travel and tourism industry due to global travel bans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 and covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the virus due to economic instability and behavioral changes leading to cultural and lifestyle changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hardships faced by smes in sectors with high public interaction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for resilience and adaptability in entrepreneurship amidst the crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Substantial spread of sars-cov-2 from patients to health-care workers due to ineffective personal protective equipment.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown effectiveness of portable air filters in clearing sars-cov-2 in real-world ward settings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 particles in the air of hospital wards","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of other pathogens in the air of hospital wards","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data uncertainties leading to inaccurate transmission models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate prioritization of investigations and surveillance activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of movement dynamics and demographics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in risk predictions due to limited training data and unknown spatial differences in treatment seeking rates.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information on receptivity to imported cases due to outdated prevalence data and changes in population dynamics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of travel histories in case data raising the possibility of infections acquired away from the location of residence.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain representation of population in cdrs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited knowledge of network subscriber demographics and daily activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertain accuracy of risk mapping approach","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exportation of parasites to other locations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of cross-border movement rate quantification","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Infection importations from neighboring countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of high resolution risk mapping with cdrs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Over-reliance on mass drug administration mda or mass screen and treat msat approach","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of post-elimination surveillance targeting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rising parasite carriage by human travellers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in quantifying and understanding human movement patterns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of human mobility on the spatial impact of interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heterogeneous pattern of impact targeting surveillance and control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Population movements leading to larger exporters of infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of human mobility on spatial impact of interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High mobility leading to increased spread of contagious diseases like malaria","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in movement patterns impacting regional spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intervention in high-mobility areas can substantially reduce disease impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differing sets of communities of strongly connected areas found in weighted networks of movements.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spatial differences between returning residents and visitors in community membership.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stronger levels of internal connectivity through movements within the same communities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Seasonal movement rates increase just before the main malaria transmission season, leading to potential spread of malaria.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial heterogeneities in movement patterns and predicted malaria risk lead to variations in relative rates of infection movements, contributing to malaria spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High movement rates drive parasite flows across the region, creating areas that are simultaneously both major sources and sinks of parasites.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Malaria risk mapping and prediction based on spatial covariates, vegetation amounts, and population density.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Analysis of population mobility patterns and trends in namibia, revealing shorter distance movements and increasing phone usage.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Human movement contributing to the spread of contagious diseases such as malaria.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of movement within communities can lead to rapid transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Returning residents and visitors from risk areas can potentially carry infections to their home location or new destination, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Movement of individuals between urban and rural areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to identify and analyze movements of travellers and migrants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Construction of a weighted network of movements between phone catchment areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Anonymized records of call and text message data were provided, but still contain potential identifying information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large volume of communications data from a significant portion of the adult population of namibia was collected.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Biases in the age distribution of mobile phone owners may affect the accuracy of the study’s findings and general estimates of human mobility.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
